resources.string: The Intelligent Equaliser analyses and dynamically adjusts the audio to match a desired tone. Choose from the four presets shown, and then touch the Spectral Visualiser to make custom modifications to the Graphic Equaliser.
The Surround Virtualiser creates realistic surround sound from any set of headphones or stereo speakers. Set the switch on or off to control the surround sound effect.
The Dialogue Enhancer improves the clarity of speech in any type of media. Set the switch on or off to control dialogue enhancement.
The Volume Leveller provides a consistent volume across all content and applications based on the master volume level of the device. Set the switch on or off to control automatic volume levelling.
